newsitem.title: USA: Intl Knife & Saw issues $90 mln 144a 10-year debt. [CORRECTED 15:02 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Intl Knife & Saw issues $90 mln 144a 10-year debt. [CORRECTED 15:02 GMT]

text.p: The following 144a private placement debt issue from International Knife & Saw was priced late on Thursday, according to a syndicate source.
The deal was increased in size by $5 million.
Schroder Wertheim & Co Inc is lead manager on the deal.
TYPE SNR SUB NOTES ISS PRICE 100.00 FIRST PAY DATE 5/15/1997
LAST MOODY'S B3 YIELD 11.375 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P B-MINUS CALLABLE NON-CALL FIVE
NOTES THREE YEAR EQUITY CALL FOR 33-1/3 AT 111.375
